titles.title: A bill to suspend temporarily the duty on 4-Chloro-1,8,-naphthalic anahydride.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 10/29/2009--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend temporarily the duty on 4-Chloro-1,8,-naphthalic anahydride.
